");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax("http://danmeirouwen.net/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}
